definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: His countenance was thoroughly good-humoured; and his manners were as friendly as the style of his letter.
sentences.chinese: 他和顏悅色，那風度就像他的信一樣親切友好。

sentences.english: She complained loudly to the owner of the store, who answered her mildly .
sentences.chinese: 她衝着和顏悅色答覆她的店主大聲抱怨。

sentences.english: The next-door neighbors are amiable people.
sentences.chinese: 隔鄰鄰人們都是和顏悅色的人。

sentences.english: She shows the same kind manner towards great and small alike.
sentences.chinese: 她對待大小人物一樣和顏悅色。
